name: marketplace-curator
description: Meta-plugin providing tools for curating your own Claude Code marketplace - discover, analyze, categorize, and create plugin collections
notes:
Complete toolkit for marketplace curation:

**Curator Agent**: Automated discovery from 13+ sources with:
- File pattern matching (agents, commands, scripts)
- 10-category classification system
- 5-star quality scoring
- Structured JSON output
- Deduplication detection

**Curation Methodology**:
- Discovery phase (Glob/Grep/Read native tools)
- Categorization (10 standard categories)
- Quality assessment (1-5 stars)
- Duplication analysis
- Best-of-breed selection
- Collection assembly

**Templates & Documentation**:
- Plugin manifest schema examples
- Marketplace manifest schema
- Real-world curated collections (12 examples)
- Analysis documents with findings

**Use Cases**:
- Create your own curated marketplace
- Discover tools from GitHub repos
- Analyze and categorize existing tools
- Build themed plugin collections
- Maintain quality standards

**Outputs**:
- Structured inventory JSON files
- Discovery summaries
- Deduplication reports
- Plugin manifests ready to use
